name: Personal projects from Péter Trombitás
body:
# Android
### Call blocker app for Android
This was a university homework. It is optimized for Android KitKat, but works well on other versions too.
[Source code](https://github.com/trombipeti/simplecallblocker/tree/master/SimpleCallBlocker/app/src/main/java/com/trombipeti/simplecallblocker)
![Main screen](images/simplecallblocker-1.png) ![Edit #1](images/simplecallblocker-2.png) ![Profiles](images/simplecallblocker-3.png) ![Settings screen](images/simplecallblocker-settings.png)

# WebGL
Some WebGL projects I created at university.
Please be noted: they make heavy use of the GPU. They're not optimized for mobile. You have been warned :)

### [Ray-casting brain visualization demo](webgl-ray-casting/brain.html)
[Source code](https://github.com/trombipeti/trombipeti.github.io/tree/master/webgl-ray-casting)
![Opacity rendering brain visualization in action](webgl-ray-casting/opacity-rendering.png)
### [Path tracer demo](webgl-path-tracing/trace.html)
[Source code](https://github.com/trombipeti/trombipeti.github.io/tree/master/webgl-path-tracing)
![Path tracing in action](webgl-path-tracing/path-tracing.png)

# C++
### [SDL/OpenGL function drawer with RPN parser, written in C++11 (source code)](https://github.com/trombipeti/cpp11/tree/master/NHF2/SDLFuncDrawer)
University subject homework.
![Function drawer in action](images/func-drawer.png)
### [Object recignition with OpenCV (source code)](https://github.com/trombipeti/Onlab/tree/master/ObjDetect)
Part of the code I wrote for my BSc thesis.

# Java
### [Rubik's Cube timer (source code)](https://github.com/trombipeti/jrubixtimer/tree/master/src/jrubixtimer)
University subject homework.

# Assembly
### [Light show for a custom ATMEGA128-based panel (source code)](https://github.com/trombipeti/asm)
![Light show in action on a simulator](images/asm-light-show-simulator.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
